page.title: 15The Centra Store
page.content: Mr. Gorman is the owner of the Centra mini-supermarket.He decided to run a supermarket in the parade of shops so that he could sell household items and food to the people in the Abbots Farm area.He tries to stock all the items that people will want. Mr. Gorman's prices are very reasonable and also very competitive with the town centre.As well as selling known brands, he also sells those which are less well known, and in this way beats the bigger supermarkets in town. Mr. Gorman has stocks delivered on a daily basis or as and when required. Older people tend to prefer his shop because it is more convenient for them to go to nearby shops than to go into town. Mr. Gorman feels that this touch of personal service has helped to build up his business.
